title: ACMI Presents: A Life Exposed: Robyn Beeche

video_links.name: ACMI Presents: A Life Exposed: Robyn Beeche

brief_description: The 2013 documentary “A Life Exposed” (directed by Lesley Branagan) explores the life and work of Australian photographer Robyn Beeche. In this ACMI event, writer and former editor of Vogue Australia, Kirstie Clements, leads a discussion between Beeche and Branagan.
